org.openimaj.image.pixel.statistics

Class BasicDescriptiveStatisticsModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.pixel.statistics.AbstractPixelStatisticsModel
      • org.openimaj.image.pixel.statistics.BasicDescriptiveStatisticsModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class BasicDescriptiveStatisticsModel
extends AbstractPixelStatisticsModel
    A model of the all the values of the pixels in an image or set of images, using basic descriptive statistics (mean, mode, median, range, variance).
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicDescriptiveStatisticsModel

        public BasicDescriptiveStatisticsModel(int ndims)
        Construct a BasicDescriptiveStatisticsModel with the given number of dimensions. The number of dimensions should normally be equal to the number of bands in the images from which the model is to be estimated.
        Parameters:
        ndims - number of dimensions
